member_organisations: THV iLand is een consortium met 8 partners: DEME, DBE, Power@Sea, Jan De Nul, Electrabel, PMV, SRIW, SOCOFE
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Plan Juncker, Projects of Common Interest, Energy Union, Horizon 2020, Energy & Climate goals and framework 2020-2030-2050
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: DEME, partner van THV iLand, is lid van EASE - European Association for Storage of Energy.
goals__remit: Ontwerp, bouw en exploitatie van een offshore energie-opslageiland voor de Belgische kust.
relevant_communication: The iLand project became PCI 2017 (number 1.18) in November 2017.
